data.message: This new update is horrible. Please roll it back. The Android app is worthless now.

replies.message: I guess I could be more specific. Read an article that you click on, go back to the top of the feed. Click on continue to reading a whole post, go back to the top of the feed. Same posts over and over and over in the feed. Completely unusable.

We're sorry to hear that, Mikala, but we appreciate your feedback. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. Let us know what would make it more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2nUSJl8. -Joe
But you don't care about the feedbacks at all.

I agree. Latest update is worse than the last one. Its almost like FB is purposely trying to sabotage their own company. Won't be too many updates down the road and FB will be completely unusable for anything people will use it for. Just becoming a FB censored shopping mall, not for posts from family & friends or local news.
I agree, too. Get rid of that stupid camera and give me back the option to see who's on at any given moment and now I can't find the "most recent" tab. Seems I'm stuck with "top stories" now.

If you listened to feedback, you would not have released this update. Because apparently, NO ONE likes it! My FB on Android is useless until you bring Most Recent back. Why in the world do I want yesterdays news, weather, etc showing up today?!?!?!

New update is HORRIBLE!!!! 
BRING BACK THE MOST RECENT BUTTON!!!!!
I agree. The update is garbage. We want the most recent button back.
Yeah it sucks. The news feed not even up to date. And showing stuff from 2 hours ago or from yesterday or the day before and nothing from right now.
Im missing my most recent too. Along with the area with group list. Can't find any of my groups that weren't in my favs!
Most recent button magically showed back up!! Woohoo!
Mine too, the people have spoken and the mighty rumble was heard. 😃😃😃😃😛
Stories SUCKS. I hate it at the top of the page. I'm not 12 and if I wanted that crap I would go on snap ya biters
There's no way of getting rid of the camera feature or the facebook stories as your stuck with it
